content: If an item that is a group repeats, then that item has more than one corresponding entry in the QuestionnaireResponse, correct? (I just noticed the spec wasn't too clear on that point, and potentially one could try to collect answers for the group's questions in a single "answers" array per question, but I don't think that would work.)
This is correct. The answers array per question would make it harder to associate the answers for the different repititions of the group. (I think rows in a table)
